page.title: 10RECREATION HALWELL&MORELEIGH
page.content: Within the limits imposed by the environment the inhabitants of Halwell and Moreleigh have created a close - knit community. Leisure pursuits are of the do-it-yourself variety. A social committee organises local events-a Pancake Race,a Sports Day,a Car Treasure Hunt,Bonfire Night Barbecue,Harvest Suppers,a Flower Festival and trips to the pantomime for the children. There is an enthusiastic team of bell ringers, a thriving football club. A group of women meet regularly at Halwell Vicarage and enjoy visiting speakers and discussions. Children from Moreleigh and Halwell are members of the Key and Quest Clubs,which are based on the Christian Faith and incorporate games evenings,practical activities and camping weekends during the school holidays.
